title: So I still can't see notifications.
body: Running Firefox, my upper right corner still looks like this.

replies.body: What operating system are you using? Are you running any add-ons to firefox?

Odd.  Have you tried using a different browser just to see if it works, e.g. Chrome (can confirm it works, using it right now)?  Have you cleared your cookies/cache or tried running in Firefox's equivalent of Incognito Mode (if it has it)?

> [{quoted}](name=Daen,realm=NA,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=rqHIFWI2,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-08T15:36:16.204+0000)
>
> Firefox's equivalent of Incognito Mode (if it has it)?

Private Browsing.
